events.name: ServerError
events.description: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request. Request ID: '{RequestId}'.

events.name: ServerErrorWithMessage
events.description: An error occurred while processing the request. Request ID: {RequestId}. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: ServiceUnavailable
events.description: Service unavailable (503). Request ID: {RequestId}. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: RedisHostIsNotSpecified
events.description: Startup error: The Redis host configuration is missing.

events.name: RedisPortIsNotSpecified
events.description: Startup error: The Redis port configuration is missing.

events.name: RedisConnectionException
events.description: Startup error: Failed to connect to Redis. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: VaultConnectionException
events.description: Startup error: Failed to connect to the Vault. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: VaultSecretCastException
events.description: Startup error: Failed to cast retrieved secrets to the expected type. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: LocalConfigurationIsInUse
events.description: Local configuration is in use.

events.name: OptionsValidationException
events.description: Startup error: Options validation exception occurred. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: DefaultCacheValueError
events.description: Unable to store a default value {CacheValue}.

events.name: PartialViewNotFound
events.description: Partial view '{PartialViewName:string}' could not be found. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: PartialViewRenderingError
events.description: An error occurred while rendering the partial view '{PartialViewName:string}'. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: ActionContextNotFound
events.description: Action context not found while trying to build an image URL from a Razor page.

events.name: ImageControllerGetMethodNotFound
events.description: Get image controller's method not found.

events.name: ImageUploadError
events.description: An error occurred while uploading the image. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: ImageDownloadError
events.description: An error occurred while downloading the image. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: ImageRemovalError
events.description: An error occurred while removing the image. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: FileUploadException
events.description: An error occurred while uploading the file. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: UnverifiedFileSignatureError
events.description: File signature verification failed. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.

events.name: FileSignatureVerificationError
events.description: File signature verification failed for files with extension '{FileExtension:string}', '{HeaderBytes:string?}'.

events.name: WarpContentEmpty
events.description: The entry content is empty.

events.name: WarpExpirationPeriodEmpty
events.description: The entry expiration period is not specified.

events.name: ImageRemovalDomainError
events.description: An error occurred in the domain layer while removing the image '{ImageId:Guid}'. Details: '{ErrorMessage:string}'.
